articles.title: Villa handed lift as key star returns after dealing with family emergency
articles.description: Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez looks certain to face West Ham on Sunday after returning from Argentina following a family emergency involving his father.
articles.content:

articles.title: Emi Martinez update after family emergency and ahead of Aston Villa's clash with West Ham
articles.description: Here's the latest after Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez flew back to Argentina to be with his stricken father Alberto this past week
articles.content:
Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez will train at Bodymoor Heath this afternoon after returning from Argentina following a family emergency involving his father, Alberto.
Martinez, 29, flew over 7,000 miles to be with his stricken dad in hospital fol... [1647 chars]

articles.title: Consistency the aim as Andy Farrell takes a long view on Ireland ambitions for World Cup 2023
articles.description: There’s usually a theme when Andy Farrell speaks to the media and yesterday ‘consistency’ was a thread that wove its way through his answers as he looked ahead to the November internationals against Japan, New Zealand and Argentina.

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Argentine wheat crop estimate increased thanks to recent rains -exchange
articles.description: (Adds details from exchange report, quotes from independent weather analyst)By Hugh Bronstein and Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Oct 28 (Reuters) - Argentina's 2021/22 wheat crop is expected at 19.8 million tonnes, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said in a report on Thursday, citing recent rains as its reason for increasing its previous 19.2 million tonnes estimate.But

articles.title: Navneet Dhaliwal to captain Canada at ICC World Cup Americas Qualifier
articles.description: TORONTO — Navneet Dhaliwal will captain Canada at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Americas Qualifier in Antigua from Nov. 7 to 15. The Canadian men will be joined by Argentina, Bahamas, Belize, Bermuda, the Cayman Islands, Panama and the U.S.
articles.content:
TORONTO — Navneet Dhaliwal will captain Canada at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Americas Qualifier in Antigua from Nov. 7 to 15. The Canadian men will be joined by Argentina, Bahamas, Belize, Bermuda, the Cayman Islands, Panama and the U.S.
